name: CodeGlyphXFeatures
summary: Runtime feature flags for CodeGlyphX capabilities.

properties.name: SupportsQrPixelDecode
properties.summary: True when the high-performance QR pixel pipeline is available (net8+).

properties.name: SupportsQrPixelDecodeFallback
properties.summary: True when the legacy QR pixel fallback path is active (non-net8 targets).

properties.name: SupportsQrPixelDebug
properties.summary: True when QR pixel debug rendering is available (net8+).

properties.name: SupportsSpanPixelPipeline
properties.summary: True when span-based pixel APIs and fast pipeline paths are available (net8+).

properties.name: TargetFramework
properties.summary: The target framework for this build (compile-time constant).
